A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is one of the best Star Wars movies made. I'm really confused as to why supposed fans are so upset by it.  

I consider myself a pretty hardcore Star Wars fan (can recite the a new hope pretty much word for word) and I thought that the trailers and the films made the film interesting and different in a way that I couldn't have anticipated.

Really pleased that it didn't go "grey" and thought the Leia bit in space was both odd and unnecessary but the lightsabre battle and the bit in the casino planet were both inspired.  Absolutely loved it - I think others were too ingrained in their own theories to really accept the truth of how magnificent this film is!
